sidebar.title: Caution vs. Warning
sidebar.simpara: When choosing the admonition type, you may find yourself getting confused between "caution" and "warning" as these words are often used interchangeably. Hereâ€™s a simple rule to help you differentiate the two:

listitem.simpara: Use CAUTION to advise the reader to act carefully (i.e., exercise care).
Use WARNING to inform the reader of danger, harm, or consequences that exist.
